title: Real-World Experience with Non-Metastatic Male Breast Cancer: A 222-Patient Multicenter Study from the Turkish Oncology Group (TOG).
abstract: Male breast cancer (MBC) is a rare disease, representing approximately 1% of all breast cancers worldwide [...].
